meanings.sent1: The math problem was inscrutable to the young students.
meanings.sent2: Her expression remained inscrutable throughout the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The inscrutable vending machine kept giving out extra snacks for free.
meanings.sent4: His inscrutable smile hid a world of secrets.
meanings.sent5: The inscrutable maze of hallways left them lost for hours.

meanings.sent1: The old house had an inscrutable aura that intrigued the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The inscrutable stranger left without a trace.
meanings.sent3: The inscrutable cat seemed to disappear and reappear at will.
meanings.sent4: Her inscrutable eyes seemed to hold the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The inscrutable fog shrouded the town in mystery.
